forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy and windy after some morning rain. High 9C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun and becoming windy in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 64F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.
